content:
I am a Senior Data Scientist at CUNY School of Public Health and Senior Biostatistician for the Bioconductor project at Roswell Park Comprehensive Cancer Center. I have been part of Levi Waldron’s Lab for about 5 years.
My interests include genomic data representations and manipulations in Bioconductor. With the help of the Bioconductor Multi-assay Special Interest Group, I’ve developed MultiAssayExperiment, an integrative container to represent and coordinate multiple experiments on a set of samples.
I also teach introductory biostatistics and programming courses at CUNY SPH, which I enjoy. These courses in R and SAS provide practical data analysis and management experience to highly motivated MPH students. I also provide individual assistance to students who are working on culminating graduate degree activities.
summary:
I am a Senior Data Scientist at CUNY School of Public Health and Senior Biostatistician for the Bioconductor project at Roswell Park Comprehensive Cancer Center. I have been part of Levi Waldron’s Lab for about 5 years.
My interests include genomic data representations and manipulations in Bioconductor. With the help of the Bioconductor Multi-assay Special Interest Group, I’ve developed MultiAssayExperiment, an integrative container to represent and coordinate multiple experiments on a set of samples.
